pr_title: loottracker - Add ignore events config option

timeline.message:
loottracker - add ability to ignore loot events

fixes #7482
loottracker - add ability to ignore loot events
loottracker - add ability to ignore loot events
loottracker - add ability to ignore loot events
loottracker - add ability to ignore loot events
loottracker - add ability to ignore loot events
loottracker - add ability to ignore loot events

timeline.author: Adam-
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -90,4 +90,21 @@ default boolean syncPanel()
 	{
 		return true;
 	}
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = "ignoredEvents",
+		name = "Ignored groups",
+		description = "Configures which loot groups should be excluded from the panel UI"
+	)
+	default String getIgnoredEvents()

replies.bodyText:
I didn't hide this as the config option for hiding items is also not hidden.
I'm pretty sure having it hidden could cause issues with the limiting that would prevent someone from re-including an event.
replies.author: TheStonedTurtle

commits_in_main.message: Merge commit
loottracker: Show chat message after NPC and PVP kills
loottracker: Improve ignored events config name and description (#11545)
add sections to various configs
loot tracker: move cox loot value message from raids to loot tracker
loottracker: submit loot when not logged in
client: update various wordings to use "signed in/out" for RL accounts
loot tracker: store loot in config
loot tracker: add remember loot option

timeline.body: If the config item for this is not actually going to be hidden, this will cause it to reorder itself randomly which seems not great
timeline.bodyText: If the config item for this is not actually going to be hidden, this will cause it to reorder itself randomly which seems not great
timeline.bodyHTML: If the config item for this is not actually going to be hidden, this will cause it to reorder itself randomly which seems not great
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText:
How would I prevent this re-ordering itself?
This method is a copy/paste of the existing toggleItem method which is also not hidden in the config panel, so it must have the same issue.
replies.author: TheStonedTurtle

timeline.body: Just call `isEventIgnored` once and store the result
timeline.bodyText: Just call isEventIgnored once and store the result
timeline.bodyHTML: Just call isEventIgnored once and store the result
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText:
I don't understand what you are asking for me to change exactly.
I did notice LootTrackerBox could just use the ignoredEvent flag locally instead of storing the result, did you mean this?
replies.author: TheStonedTurtle

replies.bodyText: isEventIgnored is called on L485 and again here on L510. You can just call it once and store the result in a variable.
replies.author: Adam-
